title: Montezuma Castle National Monument: More Cool Videos
body: More Cool Videos              Whiptail Lizard Eats Sunspider   Loading the player...    Transcript There is no transcript as the only audio are nature sounds and a tour bus arriving. Close Transcript     Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 3 seconds  We are very lucky at National Parks to view nature as it happens, even when it's right outside the parking lot! In this video a whiptail lizard tries to eat a sunspider, or windscorpion. This is a video in which one animal effectively kills another, so please don't watch if you are sensitive. The sound at the end is a tour bus arriving. For more information on sunspiders please see http://www.ext.colostate.edu/pubs/insect/05589.html
